sentences.en: a lack of spiritual values in the modern world
sentences.cn: 现代世界精神价值的缺失

sentences.en: a spiritual that segued into a singalong chorus
sentences.cn: 一首转为会众集体跟唱的灵歌

sentences.en: Are spiritual or worldly values more important?
sentences.cn: 精神上的价值重要,还是物质的价值重要 呢 ?

sentences.en: Chen was an initiate of a Chinese spiritual discipline.
sentences.cn: 陈是某个中国神学领域的新入门者。

sentences.en: Crass materialism causes people to forget spiritual values.
sentences.cn: 极端唯物主义使人忘掉精神价值.

sentences.en: Her spiritual beauty outshone her physical beauty.
sentences.cn: 她的心灵美胜于外表美.

sentences.en: His spiritual depression came to an end when she kissed him.
sentences.cn: 她的亲吻扫除了他精神上的苦闷.
他心灵本质上是善良的.

sentences.en: I had always thought of Italy as my spiritual home.
sentences.cn: 我一直把意大利当作我的第二故乡。

sentences.en: I think I'm more aware now of some spiritual things and I do believe in good and evil.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我现在更加注重精神生活，而且我真的相信善恶报应。

sentences.en: Painting helps fill a spiritual need for beauty.
sentences.cn: 绘画可以满足对美的精神需求。

sentences.en: People need a chance to re - flect on spiritual matters in solitude.
sentences.cn: 人们需要独处的机会来反思精神上的事情.

sentences.en: Surely there is some way of ordering our busy lives so that we can live in comfort and find spiritual harmony too.
sentences.cn: 总会有办法能安排好我们忙碌的生活，这样就能过得舒服一点，同时还能达到内心的平静。

sentences.en: The account of spiritual struggle that follows has a humbling and numinous power.
sentences.cn: 之后关于精神挣扎的叙述有一种令人心生卑微之感的神秘力量。

sentences.en: The Pope is the spiritual leader of many Christians.
sentences.cn: 教皇是众多基督徒的宗教领袖.
他们的友情完全是精神上的.

sentences.en: You can start now to tune in to your own physical, social and spiritual needs.
sentences.cn: 你现在可以开始关注自己的生理、社交与精神需求。

words.tran_cn: 精神；心灵；情绪；志气；烈酒
圣歌（尤指美国南部黑人的）

phrases.tran_cn: 第二故乡，对之有强烈归属感的地方

trans.tran_en: relating to your spirit rather than to your body or mind
a religious song of the type sung originally by African-Americans
